sentence: In March 2021, Twitter temporarily restricted Ohio U.S. Senate candidate Josh Mandel in Match for violating the social media platform's rules.
author: Charlotte Trattner
title: Ohio Bill Could Make It Easier to Sue Social Media Companies Over Censorship

sentence: Republican candidate for the U.S. Senate in Ohio, Josh Mandel, pulled no punches during an interview with RSBN’s Brian Glenn at CPAC Friday, boldly stating, “I believe this election was stolen from Donald J. Trump.” He added, “I’m the only candidate in the race for U.S. Senate who’s been calling for an audit in Pennsylvania, Wisconsin, Michigan, Georgia, and everywhere we roam.” Mandel, who recently completed two terms as Ohio’s treasurer, is also an eight-year veteran of the United States Marine Corps.
author: Summer Lane
title: Josh Mandel swings at election fraud: ‘I believe this election was stolen’

sentence: Former Ohio Representative and current Senate candidate, Josh Mandel, told Bernice King to 'study your history better' on Tuesday when King refuted statements Mandel made.
title: Republican mansplains MLK Jr's beliefs... to MLK Jr's daughter
